mean_cn: n. 流线型；  adj. 流线型的；  vt. 使成流线型，简化…的过程，使一体化
mean_en: to design or make (something, such as a boat or car) with a smooth shape which makes motion through water or air easier
sentence: The design of the car has been streamlined so it can go even faster.
sentence_trans: 这辆车的车身成流线型设计，这样它可以跑得更快。
